|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)))

comment: The domain of definition of the internal direct product, which states that ` S ` is a family of subgroups that mutually commute and have trivial intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
